document_data.name: Janthool
document_data.mainbody: '''Janthool''' was a merchant in [[Athkatla]] in [[1359 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Janthool traveled [[Faer√ªn]] in order to make money. He tried to damage [[Aurora's Emporium]] by hiring [[orc]]s and bandits to attack their outlets.
document_data.History: Janthool gained wealth thanks to shrewd bartering and careful, covert investments. One time he arranged a stampede against the Aurora's outlet in [[Waterdeep]] but had to flee the city hastily when evidence was given against him. In 1367 DR, he found a treasure in [[Soubar]].
